name: Midnight Fortress (prototype)
description:
Done in a little less than two weeks for #myfirstgamejam January 2016! First game or prototype of one I ever make! It is unfinished, so that means:

  • no sound or music.
  • you're invincible.
  • lack of assets.
  • trying to go past enemies roon restart the game.
  • It only has like 5 rooms and only 1 ain't empty : P

Despite not being finished, I'm proud of what I made on this jam. Thanks for taking the time to look!

Controls:

  • Z or space for jump.
  • C for punch.
  • Move is arrow keys.
